title: Pistachio crusted rack of lamb, fig and olive tapenade with orange roasted roots
description: This very special cut of lamb is given a crunchy mustard and nut crust and served with honey roasted vegetables.
ingredients: 1 small butternut squash, peeled and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 to 4 racks of lamb (depending on the size)
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped and pitted black olives
